text: École supérieure des sciences commerciales d'Angers (ESSCA) is an European higher studies establishment. The school is in 8 places, in Angers, Boulogne- Billancourt, Cholet, Aix-en-Provence, Lyon, Bordeaux, Budapest and Shanghai. It has been created in 1909.Angers. L’Essca vise le top 30 européen avec un plan d’investissement de 100 millions d’euros ESSCA is specialist in the fields of economics, social sciences and management. == References == == Further reading == * ESSCA website Category:1909 establishments in France Category:1909 establishments in the United States Category:Education in France Category:Angers
title: École supérieure des sciences commerciales d'Angers
